file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 05-20-62-06 - ELEVATOR - EXTERNAL - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL ELEVATOR - EXTERNAL - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do the visual inspection of the elevator for general condition. B. Related Zones: 335/336. C. (Applicable to EMB-145 (ALL) models) Zone Boundaries: STA X = 28236.2 thru STA X = 29574.6. (Applicable to EMB-135 (ALL) models) Zone Boundaries: STA X = 24696.2 thru STA X = 26034.8. D. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ELEVATOR - EXTERNAL GENERAL VISU- ALL 05-20-62-200-801-A ♦ AL INSPECTION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 05-20-62 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 05-20-62-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. ELEVATOR - EXTERNAL GENERAL VISUAL INSPECTION A. General (1) This task gives instructions to do SMRD Zonal Task 55-Z335-213-001-A00. (2) You must do the external general visual inspection (GVI) of elevator, at zones 335/336, within a touching distance of the items examined. (3) The function of the external general visual inspection (GVI) is to find damage, failure, or irregular conditions that can be easily seen. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 12-22-00-600-801-A/300 LIGHT DIRT - SERVICING AMM TASK 12-22-00-600-802-A/300 HEAVY DIRT - SERVICING C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Standard Ladder To get access to the inspection area E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Elevator I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A WARNING: MAKE SURE THAT THE ELEVATOR IS NOT OPERATED ACCIDENTALLY. AN ACCIDENTAL OPERATION OF THE ELEVATOR CAN CAUSE INJURY TO PERSONS. (1) Put the ladder in position. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 05-20-62 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) If necessary, clean the inspection area (AMM TASK 12-22-00-600-801-A/300) or (AMM TASK 12-22-00-600-802-A/300) as applicable. J. External General Visual Inspection (Figure 601) SUBTASK 212-002-A (1) Examine the elevator zone for loose rivets, nicks, cracks, dents, skin deformation, sealant condition, erosion, corrosion, painting bad condition, deteriorated protective treatment, and bonding jumper condition (Figure 601). K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Remove the ladder. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 05-20-62 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
